prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

extra.memory:
Shortly after Melissa's divorce from Edward, Nicole, Melissa's best friend, purchased VIP level tickets for a show at the Ark, in Ann Arbor, where Faun would be performing.  During the pre-show meet-and-greet Oliver Satyr, Faun's front-man, found himself captivated by Melissa.

Not one to be dismissive when fate comes calling. Oliver quickly set up a post-show meeting with Melissa in hopes he could get to know her better. Having cut ties with his long-time girlfriend, Gina Wetzel, months ago, Oliver felt ready to pursue something new. So he made a bold move, that he typically doesn't do with a fan, and he asked for Melissa's number.

Melissa didn't really consider that much else would come of it. Recognizing the kind of women that flaunt themselves at Oliver, and she's just a normal girl. She didn't get her hopes up. Yet her surprise was evident when Oliver called her three days after his last show on the United States tour. alerting her that he was back in Michigan and wanted to see her.

After spending a week together, both realizing that there was definitely more to their connection than just the superficial attraction, Oliver brought up the possibility that he would like to explore their connection even further. While they both remained apprehensive of jumping in head first and upheaving either of their lives, they decided to try a long distance committed relationship.

And as of now, their relationship is three months strong, and going.

name: Narrator
mes: It's early morning in Michigan, nearly lunchtime in Munich, and Melissa calls Oliver while on her drive to work.
swipes: It's early morning in Michigan, nearly lunchtime in Munich, and Melissa calls Oliver while on her drive to work.
